nodes.name: createPoll
commitVote
revealVote
createPoll
commitVote
revealVote

commitVote(uint256,bytes32,uint256).details: Commit a vote in a poll to be later revealed

params._tokensToCommit: Number of tokens to commit to vote

createPoll(uint256,uint256).details: Create a new poll to accept votes based on the configuration

params._commitEndBlock: Block number when commit phase ends
params._revealEndBlock: Block number when reveal phase ends

createPoll(uint256,uint256).return: Poll index number. Will be used as the key for interacting with a vote.

params._voteSalt: Salt used to in hash to obfuscate vote option

commitVote(uint256,bytes32,uint256).notice: Commit a vote in a poll to be later revealed

createPoll(uint256,uint256).notice: Create a new poll to accept votes based on the configuration
